ai.nuralogix.anurasdk.camera

Interface CameraAdapter


  • public interface CameraAdapter
    Camera interface accepted by Nura SDK, it would be used in camera source, to capture video frames from camera. It is not supposed to do real capture but just previewing.

    The implementation of the interface should adapt different cameras' APIs to the same this interface.

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      static int IDLE_STATE
      Indicates camera is in initial state doing nothing
      static int OPENED_STATE
      Indicates camera is opened and ready to use
      static int PREVIEWING_STATE
      Indicates camera is in previewing state which is the main state of the camera used in Nura
      static int PREVIEWING_STOPPED
      Indicates camera previewing session is stopped, ready for next session

      • setISOAndExposureDuration

        AnuraError setISOAndExposureDuration(int iso,
                                     long exposureDuration)
        Sets ISO and exposure time (shutter speed)
        Parameters:
        iso - the amount of gain applied to sensor data
        exposureDuration - duration each pixel is exposed to light in nanoseconds
        Returns:
        AnuraError.OK if set successfully, AnuraError.ERROR otherwise

                                   float greenEven,

                                   float blue)
        Sets RGB gains for white-balance
        Parameters:
        red - float: red pixel
        greenEven - float: green pixel (even row)
        greenOdd - float: green pixel (odd row)
        blue - float: blue pixel
        Returns:
        AnuraError.OK if set successfully, AnuraError.ERROR otherwise
